job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Description:</strong></p><ul><li>Design, develop, test and implement technology solutions utilizing AWS technologies.</li><li>Ensure technology solutions comply with enterprise architecture standards and principles while identifying opportunities for application reuse and extensibility.</li><li>Works with diverse technologies to design, develop (build), test, and implement automated solutions for existing and new software.</li><li>Provides production support of current applications and collaborates with other developers in order to mature process and reduce technical debt.</li><li>Collaborates with business areas to develop a thorough understanding of business processes, identify application development solutions, enhance new or existing applications, integrate purchased or System solutions to meet business requirements.</li><li>Documents, analyzes and resolves problems, tests, implements, provides on-going support and assists in responding to audit reviews and findings for existing applications/software.</li><li>Applies the appropriate software/system development life cycle methodology; collaborates with others in development work to achieve desired results; provides planning, estimation, and management of medium to high complexity projects using established methodologies and practices.</li><li>Researches, evaluates, and recommends application programming solutions, identifies ways to reuse existing code, and designs prototypes using current or emerging technologies.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Education:</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree or equivalent combination of education and experience; major or coursework in Computer Science or Management Information Systems (MIS) is preferred.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Experience:</strong></p><ul><li>Minimum of 1-2 years of real world experience in application development using current technology trends and architectural development solutions.</li><li>AWS Cloud Native Solutions development</li><li>AWS Serverless Solutions including: Lambda, Dynamo DB, API Gateway</li><li>Experience with 1 or more functional and typed languages: Typescript, Javascript, C#, JAVA</li><li>Unit testing frameworks Advanced analytical skills and the ability to manage multiple projects/priorities are needed.</li><li>Strong oral, written, and interpersonal skills are needed.</li><li>Must be comfortable working in an iterative development, highly collaborative environment with the ability to lead from various aspects of the SDLC process.</li></ul>
